text: Hey everyone :wave:  - we put out a patch release to fix a few bugs reported in boilerplate (v1.2.2) (<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/releases/tag/v1.2.2>) related to supporting `node.linkTarget` in the menu module, removing the parameter of `locked: true` on the menu field in the menu module, and removing a line-height set on the search field in the header as that was causing some issues in Safari.
